title: Listen Riot
body:
I went 5/0/21 on blitz with 55 farm and got an S
my team mate went 3/8/6 with 221 farm and got an a+
I would like to report Riot for this where can I do so Please and Thank you

replies.body:
It depends on much more than KDA, especially for supports. Remember you are being compared to the best in your region.

Keep trying!
